sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from "react"; import {useSpring, animated} from 'react-spring'; //import components import Quote from "./quote"; import DriverInfo from "./driverInfo"; function QuotesPage({driverInfo, setDriverInfo}){ //states to toggle the form on and off, and to input information to the form const [toggleAdd, setToggleAdd] = useState(false); const [postForm, setPostForm] = useState([]); function toggleAddForm(){ if(toggleAdd){ setToggleAdd(false); } else{ setToggleAdd(true); } } //Animation to open and close the 'Add a Quote' form const openAddForm = useSpring({ height: "75vh", opacity: 1, from: { height: "0vh", opacity: 0 }, config: { mass: 1, tension: 170, friction: 20 }, reset: true }) const closeAddForm = useSpring({ height: "0vh", opacity: 0, from: { height: "75vh", opacity: 1 }, config: { mass: 1, tension: 170, friction: 20 }, reset: true }) return(

); } export default QuotesPage;
